text:
January 17, 1956
Mr. Waldo Abbot
Director of Broadcasting
Radio Station WUOM
University of Michigan
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Waldot
â€” We now have enough votes to decide on the series you
named. I wander if John Regnell has sent his votes to you. He has
told me his vote. 1*11 ask him to be sure hereafter to let you
know too.
Pretty busy right now. Seems as if all the little
things that have to be done come at once.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
JHiwc
John Holt
Network Manager
